announcement:
🚨Students of Batch Fall-2025 are not able to access the features of Airuni Connect that require login through students id, We are aware of this issue and we will allow them to login through their students id within the next two days. Thanks for your patience.
❗Issue reported with the Class reminders on some devices has been fixed. Update the app and report any further issue if found.
📢 Internship Season Update
Dear Users, as this year’s internship season nears its end, the frequency of internship postings on AirUni Connect may decrease. Verified opportunities will continue to be shared as soon as they are available. Thank you for your support
